library(tidyverse)

party_shell <- data.frame(Party=character(),

gender_shell <- data.frame(Gender=character(),

# Hawaii

HI_req_send_tot <- data.frame(Total=character(),
                                  Count=integer(),
                                  Percent=double(),
                                  stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

HI_req_send_tot[1,1] <- "TOTAL"

HI_req_send_tot$Percent <- 100.0
